languages.text: Ноктюрн Забвения вовлек Вольного Торговца в свой малопонятный план побега из Комморры. Не будучи посвященн{mf|ым|ой} в нюансы его интриги, Лорд-капитан может лишь следовать по намеченному Арлекином пути и зорко выискивать возможность, чтобы разорвать нити, превращающие е{mf|го|е} в марионетку ксеноса.

Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.
languages.original_text: Ноктюрн Забвения вовлек Вольного Торговца в свой малопонятный план побега из Комморры. Не будучи посвященн{mf|ым|ой} в нюансы его интриги, Лорд-капитан может лишь следовать по намеченному Арлекином пути и зорко выискивать возможность, чтобы разорвать нити, превращающие е{mf|го|е} в марионетку ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuance of his true intentions, Lord Captain can only follow the Harlequin's lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

languages.text: Le Nocturne de l'Oubli a décidé d'impliquer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans son mystérieux plan d'évasion. Ignorant tout des nuances des véritables intentions de l'Arlequin, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne peut que lui emboîter le pas, en restant toutefois à l'affût de la moindre occasion de se libérer des liens qui {mf|le|la} rattachent au marionnettiste xénos.
languages.original_text: Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

traits.locale_text: Le Nocturne de l'Oubli a décidé d'impliquer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans son mystérieux plan d'évasion. Ignorant tout des nuances des véritables intentions de l'arlequin, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne peut que lui emboîter le pas, en restant toutefois à l'affût de la moindre occasion de se libérer des liens qui {mf|le|la} rattachent au marionnettiste xénos.

languages.text: 遗忘夜曲决定让行商浪人参与他神秘的逃亡计划。行商浪人对丑角的真实意图一无所知，目前只能暂时跟随丑角的指挥，找机会切断这位木偶大师手中的提线。
languages.original_text: Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

traits.locale_text: 遗忘夜曲决定让行商浪人参与他神秘的逃亡计划。行商浪人对丑角的真实意图一无所知，目前只能暂时跟随丑角的指挥，找机会切断这位木偶大师手中的提线。

languages.text: 忘却のノクターンは、自身の謎めいた脱出計画に自由開拓者を巻き込むことにした。ハーレクィンの真の目的の意味合いを明かされていないロード・キャプテンは、異種族の人形使いの指先と結びついている糸を断ち切る機会を探りつつ、彼の指示に従うほかない。
languages.original_text: Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

traits.locale_text: 忘却のノクターンは、自身の謎めいた脱出計画に自由開拓者を巻き込むことにした。ハーレクィンの真の目的の意味合いを明かされていないロード・キャプテンは、異種族の人形使いの指先と結びついている糸を断ち切る機会を探りつつ、彼の指示に従うほかない。

languages.text: Nocturne des Nichts hat entschieden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in seinen rätselhaften Fluchtplan einzubeziehen. Der Lord Captain wurde im Dunkeln gelassen, was die wahren Absichten des Harlekins angeht. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann dem Harlekin daher nur folgen und auf eine Gelegenheit warten, die Fäden zu kappen, welche {mf|ihn|sie} mit den Fingern des Xenos-Puppenspielers verbinden.
languages.original_text: Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

traits.locale_text: Nocturne des Nichts hat entschieden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in seinen rätselhaften Fluchtplan einzubeziehen. Der Lord Captain wurde im Dunkeln gelassen, was die wahren Absichten des Harlekins angeht. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann dem Harlekin daher nur folgen und auf eine Gelegenheit warten, die Fäden zu kappen, welche {mf|ihn|sie} mit den Fingern des Xenos-Puppenspielers verbinden.

languages.text: Nocturno del Olvido ha decidido involucrar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en su enigmático plan de huida. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán no conoce los detalles de las verdaderas intenciones del Arlequín, pero solo puede seguir sus indicaciones mientras busca la ocasión de cortar las cuerdas que le atan a los dedos de su titiritero xenos.
languages.original_text: Nocturne of Oblivion has decided to involve the Rogue Trader in his enigmatic escape plan. Kept in the dark about the nuances of the Harlequin's true intentions, the Lord Captain can only follow his lead while looking for opportunities to cut the strings tying {mf|him|her} to the tips of the xenos puppeteer's fingers.

languages.text: Nisyan Noktürnü, esrarengiz kaçış planına Hür Tacir'i de dâhil etmeye karar verdi. Arleken'in asıl niyetinden habersiz olan Lord Kaptan, zeno kuklacının iplerinden onu kurtaracak bir fırsat ararken sadece onu takip edebilir.
